attributes.action: Provide shelter and support for the homeless during the coronavirus pandemic
attributes.additional_details: It’s their moral duty to help all citizens of this country. Everyone should have the same basic rights to a home, shelter, food and medical facilities.
attributes.background: To provide facilities and food for the homeless during the coronovirus pandemic. This will protect them and allow them to be isolated where necessary. The public is being told they will be supported but there has been no mention of the homeless.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
